corrections.notes: Page 20 states: 'up to two 2D ultrasound scans or one 2D ultrasound scan and one nuchal translucency test' - this means 2-4 scans based on pregnancy type. '12 consultations' refers to antenatal visits, not scans.

corrections.corrected_value: Varies: R0 at network provider for PMB, R4,650 day clinic, R5,700 hospital
corrections.notes: Page 27 clarifies: - Day clinic account: R4,650 (reduces to R5,450 if doctor in value-based network). - Hospital account: R5,700 (reduces to R6,850 if scopes performed by value-based network doctor). - Bi-directional (gastro + colonoscopy same admission): R5,700. - R0 if PMB condition, patient 12+ years, performed at in-rooms network provider.

notes: Cross-validation complete. Corrections applied to maternity scan limits and procedure co-payments. Data ready for promotion to extracted_data.
